name: Offroad Hill Climb
description:
Offroad driving to the max! Climb steep, rocky mountains, traverse muddy swamps, drive over drawbridges and more! Complete multiple levels of increasingly difficult challenges and get to the finish line!

Features:
- 10 unique offroad cars to drive
- 25 exciting levels to complete
- Multiple settings to discover

Drive buggies, pickups, monster trucks and more! Use them to conquer offroad challenges in exciting and varied settings. Show your driving skills in the desert, taiga, jungle, and more! Unlock new cars and levels as you progress through the game and become an offroad racing champion!
